channel.title: I cant trade
channel.description: how can i add the trade funtion to my server its there when i right click but if does nothign

item.title: I cant trade
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“deershoot3r, post:7, topic:264315”]can i get a tutorial?[/quote]Not everything is ready to be spoonfed to you. Most original ideas have to be implemented into your server and client by yourself. I suggest learning the fundamentals of Java and/or the structure, setup, and how your server works before continuing.

Read full topic

item.title: I cant trade
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:5, topic:264315”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=349056.msg2683710#msg2683710 date=1235529141]
Is it a 508? If so, most 508’s dont have working trading.
[/quote]He asked how he could add it not if it comes with it.

Look at how the trading packets are setup and processed within the client, and reverse-engineer it. After that, you should easily be able to get the server to communicate with the client properly and wa-lah: trading.[/quote]Oh, my bad, I’m tired… and just kinda skimmed it really quick. And saw trading and wont work.

Read full topic

item.title: I cant trade
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:2, topic:264315”]Is it a 508? If so, most 508’s dont have working trading.[/quote]He asked how he could add it not if it comes with it.

Look at how the trading packets are setup and processed within the client, and reverse-engineer it. After that, you should easily be able to get the server to communicate with the client properly and wa-lah: trading.

Read full topic
